subject: Retirement
Football
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: As Hideki Matsui and Donovan McNabb illustrated this week, the one-day contract has become a rite of passage for modern athletes — a select few, anyway — before they retreat from the spotlight.
snippet: As Hideki Matsui and Donovan McNabb illustrated this week, the one-day contract has become a rite of passage for modern athletes — a select few, anyway — before they retreat from the spotlight.
